response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship, innovative features, and the unique benefits it offers. Given its unparalleled value, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $10,000. We believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to experience the superior quality firsthand while enjoying a significant saving. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
